reviews.review:
Played this with friends definitely recommend for anyone wanting to play with 3 other friends as survivors or if you want to que up solo as the killer.
While some characters feel broken a lot of it is simply understanding how they work as each character has different skills and abilities. 
Buy this if its on special or retail price its worth either way.
Very fun, Seems scary but it really isn't
Good game but if you buy it remember if you ever facecamp I will bite your nuts off

"Basement camping leatherface. I genuinely think there is something wrong with this guy. He is super toxic and basement camps on leatherface. He is really bad and tends to get looped throughout the whole game which is probably why he basement camps with leatherface and facecamps. I am willing to spend money to get this guy a coach and therapy for whatever went wrong with him and happened that caused him to be this thing.Even as a survivor he somehow manages to maintain his toxicity. He wastes pallets and god pallets without a second thought. He even sandbags other people just to keep himself alive and is not afraid to dc and afk. He has a sandbag/dodge list.There is genuinely something wrong with this guy. If you see him dodge the lobby. It is not worth playing the game when he is in a lobby. Again I am willing to pay for his therapy and coach to get better at the game. If something happens to this guy and he finally stops being toxic and reforms message me."

if you need to Camp as a killer, dont play. You destroy the game for others. It has nothing to do with skill

As much as playing killer in this game makes you want to pull all your hair out and cry in a corner of the map I can't put this game to rest. "Fun" isn't the word to give to DbD, more like, bearably frustrating.
10/10 must play game.

This game is really good but the community is kinda garbage. Lot's of quitters or people who join a game and AFK the whole time. Some people queue in and farm points together, and if you actually play the game you will get killed for it. 

Wish people were more bought in to the idea of the game and less on Blood Point farming

playing survivor is impossible with randoms


only play killer if you have sadomasochistic tendencies.
This game has become so unbearable with bully squads and toxic survivors that i often freak out and destroy my PC's hardware. 
So long term this game is an expensive hobby and i highly recommend never touching it if you want to keep your psyche sane.

19.06.2022: this game leads me into a mental crisis that i have never felt before...

22.06.2022: buying this was the worst decision of my life, JUST FIX THE F***ING WINDOW PINGHITS

13.07.2022: remove dead hard, survs dont deserve a guaranteed second chance every time i win a chase.

19.07.2022: nerf bullysquads and bodyblocking

24.07.2022: close russian servers please

12.08.2022: nerf tunneling
